content: **crocheted bag with 1 strand drops paris and 1 strand drops kid-silk piece is worked bottom up ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern w-923 yarn group c + a or d ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** height without strap approx 16 cm width approx 9 cm length of strap approx 90 cm **yarn** drops paris from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 50 g colour 23 light grey and use drops kid-silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 25 g colour 07 light sky blue **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 4 5 mm **crochet gauge** 15 double crochets in width and 16 row vertically with 2 strands = 10 x 10 cm note remember that the hook size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger hook if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller hook
